p: Fatty acid composition of oils can change during storage. Results shown in Table 2 confirm that there was a significant change (p< 0.05) during 90 days storage of oil samples. There was a significant decrease (p< 0.05) in 18:2 and 18:3. However, this decrease could not increase the ω6:ω3 ratio beyond optimal levels. It has been previously reported that changes in fatty acid composition of olive oil occurs during storage.17
